name: ghostkit/grid
title: Grid
description: Add a block that displays content in responsive grid columns, then add whatever content blocks you'd like.

name: ghostkit/grid-column
title: Column
description: A single column within a grid block.

name: ghostkit/button
title: Buttons
description: Add button wrapper block with inner buttons.

name: ghostkit/button-single
title: Button
description: A single button within a buttons wrapper block.

name: ghostkit/tabs-tab
title: Tab
description: A single tab within a tabs block.

name: ghostkit/accordion-item
title: Item
description: A single item within a accordion block.

name: ghostkit/carousel
title: Carousel
description: Add a block that displays content inside carousel, then add whatever content blocks you'd like.

name: ghostkit/carousel-slide
title: Slide
description: A single slide within a carousel block.

name: ghostkit/changelog
title: Changelog
description: Block for adding changelog for you products.

name: ghostkit/pricing-table-item
title: Pricing Table Item
description: A single item within a pricing table block.

name: ghostkit/instagram
title: Instagram
description: Show instagram feed and user data.

name: ghostkit/twitter
title: Twitter
description: Show twitter feed and user data.

name: ghostkit/customizer
title: Customizer
description: Replace the customizer options for current post.
